messages.title: YOUR CHOICE ON THURSDAY:
messages.content: Liberal Democrat MPs who champion their communities and will stand up for our NHS. OR Conservative MPs who are backing heartless cuts to our NHS services.

messages.title: A LIBERAL DEMOCRAT VOTE ON THURSDAY WILL GIVE OUR NHS THE BOOST IT NEEDS.
THIS THURSDAY STOP THE NHS CUTS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats would put 1p on income tax to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.
More Conservative MPs will mean more heartless NHS cuts.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Everyone knows Labour can't win in this area on Thursday.

issues.health: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase income tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care. More Conservative MPs will mean more heartless NHS cuts. Tory cuts have left our NHS on the brink of collapse.

endorsements.endorsement: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase income tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.
The Tory manifesto says, in effect, that people who need care in old age will have to pay for every penny of it - no matter how big the costs.
Tory cuts have left our NHS on the brink of collapse, says shocking report.

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase income tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.
The Tory manifesto says, in effect, that people who need care in old age will have to pay for every penny of it - no matter how big the costs.
Tory cuts have left our NHS on the brink of collapse, says shocking report.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contrasts the policies of the Liberal Democrats with those of the Conservative party, focusing on NHS funding and services. It mentions that Labour can't win in the area, implying tactical voting considerations.
